data.title: Iceberg
data.text:
SYNOPSIS

19-year-old Stefanos is a passionate conspiracy theorist who applies his global perspective to his older brother’s recent drugs-related death.

In an attempt to release his suffering he seeks revenge on the man he blames for his loss and enters a world that defies him. Still, he perseveres to fight his way to redemption.
